headerText: The `v-btn` component replaces the standard html button with a material design theme and a multitude of options. Any color helper class can be used to alter the background or text color.

flat.desc: Flat buttons have no box shadow and no background. Only on hover is the container for the button shown.

raised.desc: Raised buttons have a box shadow that increases when clicked. This is the default style.

depressed.desc: Depressed buttons still maintain their background color, but have no box shadow.

dropdown.desc: Button dropdowns are regular selects with additional styling.

icon.desc: Icons can be used for the primary content of a button.

floating.desc: Floating buttons are round and usually contain an icon.

loaders.desc: Using the loading prop, you can notify a user that there is processing taking place. The default behavior is to use a `v-progress-circular` component but this can be customized.

sizing.desc: Buttons can be given different sizing options to fit a multitude of scenarios.

outline.desc: Outline buttons inherit their borders from the current color applied.

round.desc: Rounded buttons behave the same as regular buttons but have rounded edges.

block.desc: Block buttons extend the full available width.

v-btn.block: Expands the button to 100% of available space
v-btn.icon: Designates the button as icon - round and flat
v-btn.round: Button will be round on the sides
